div.p: This implementation guide is STU. There are a number of open issues that will need to be resolved before it will be fully implementable and a number of additional clean-up steps that will need to be taken before the guide is published for ballot. A list of known issues follows. If there are additional issues you feel should be discussed/addressed, please raise them on the project discussion stream on http://chat.fhir.org.
These are topics that will require debate and discussion with domain experts to determine how the specification should work. Project calls will focus on resolving these issues.
